topic.title: Welcome to the Free Speech forum
topic.body: Saying whatever you god-damn wanna say, and expressing your opinions, and not giving a shit if a spineless minority deems it "offensive".

2_14oqzN7fCAtc3RPUWL4sKqEfkVFYHbZyyF.body:
Done.

Thanks for pointing me in the right direction. :-)

1_1PvAyLAB5H1JKbiFjx95ZJXrNJVyWxs5Hf.body:
I don't think it's possible to know that.

The number of peers may be an indication, but it's still not the real number. One example:

ZeroName (1Name2NXVi1RDPDgf5617UoW7xA6YrhM9F) has 63 peers in my list but over at http://bit.no.com:43110/ it has 174 peers.
AFAIK the only way to get such information would be to use a cookie, but as most ad-blockers do block trackers it would not be an accurate number.
